metadata.title: CVE-2016-9180 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: perl-XML-Twig: The option to `expand_external_ents`, documented as controlling external entity expansion in XML::Twig does not work. External entities are always expanded, regardless of the option's setting.

notes.note: mdeslaur> as of 2017-08-01, no upstream fix

criterions.comment: libxml-twig-perl package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2017-08-01').
